categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Riencam was a female Human who served as a supply officer in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire. During the Battle of Corellia in the Galactic War, she was stationed at the South Tram Station in the Axial Park region of the planet Corellia, distributing stimulants and medical supplies to other Imperial forces.
Supply Officer Riencam appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Stims Vendor for Imperial players on Corellia.
